glitch-help-instructions: For a custom domain, change the 'url' parameter from 'glitch-default' to your domain _without_ a traling slash, like 'https://www.example.com'
title: E.S.T.B. aka EzCaptcha Status Telegram Bot by Tavel and GPT-4o
description: Telegram bot, written entirely using GPT-4o, checks the current status of Outlook's FunCAPTCHA solution via EzCaptcha API.
